newsitem.title: USA: NationsBank sets Boatman cash election price.
newsitem.headline: NationsBank sets Boatman cash election price.

text.p: NationsBank Corp said that it has set the cash election option for Boatmen's Bancshares Inc at $63.11 per share.

NationsBank said that the average closing price of its common stock from December 13, 1996 through December 27 is $96.725 per share. This is the price on which the cash portion of the purchase price for the pending merger is based.
The company said that each share of Boatmen's common will be converted into 0.6525 shares of NationsBank common, or at the holder election, $63.11, or 0.6525 times $96.725, in cash.
